work_with_me_opening:
I am always looking for great students (both undergraduates and M.Sc.). If you are a good student (from the CS. or Math. department in BIU), and you are curious about research and want to learn, we should talk. Expect hard work, but also lots of fun! Currently, I can only co-advise.

The following topics are projects that I find intresting to do. That said, this list is incomplete; and open to other topics you may have. First, micro-expressions recognition using a standard camera. Second, numerical solution for two-phase floyd in a cylinder (navier-stokes equations). Third, Property-Value extraction from academic papers in English.

projects.name: Extended Pharmacokinetics-Pharmadynamics Mathematical Model For Nanomedicine Targeted Drug Delivery
projects.description: An extantion of the privious project, improving flow dynamics and NPs-body interactions. Providing a large scale comparision experiment.

projects.name: Mathematical Model for Medical Nanoparticles in the Circulatory System
projects.description: Providing a graph-base model for large scale in vivo pharmacokinetics-pharmadynamics nanoparticles for the drug delivery case.

projects.name: Sphera â€“ A template for personal academic websites
projects.description: Sphera is a free open-source website template that will vastly improve the communication between lecturers and students. It will provide lecturers and professors with the tools to easily create a professional personal website that contains their research, courses and personal projects. We will study the user behaivor in personal acadmic websites and how to improve it using machine learning reccomendation system.

projects.name: Non-observable Economy Size Estimation with Stabalized Model
projects.description: A new (more stable) mathematical model for estimating the non-observable economy. An empirical analysis for Israel is conducted.

projects.name: Lung Metastases Growth Patterns From Colorectal Cancer
projects.description: A PDE location-based model of the growth of lung metastases from colorectal cancer and fitting on clinical data.

projects.name: Balanced Explainability-Performance Feature Selection Algorithm
projects.description: A feature selection algorithms that uses iterative ensemble intersections given preformance and explainability metrics to obtain a balanced feature set.

projects.name: Hebrew words associative distance and connection to depression
projects.description: Developing a machine learning model for words associative distance (Hebrew). Based on this model, propusing new depression test for clinical professionals.

projects.name: Predicting Acute Kidney Injury Due To Partial Nephrectomy Treatment
projects.description: Developing an explanable AI to predict acute kidney injury (AKI) complications due to Partial Nephrectomy (PN) treatment.

projects.name: Decision Tree Post-Pruning Without Loss Of Accuracy
projects.description: Developing an post pruning algorithm that does not harm the model's performance. Evaluation on oncology data is provided.

projects.name: Stochastic Process Representation Of The Extended SIRD Group Of Models
projects.description: Representation of the SIRD model as a stochastic process and obtaining analytical points of interest.

projects.name: Pandemic Management by a Spatio-temporal Mathematical Model
projects.description: A spatio-temporal mathematical model based on the SIR model and graph-based spatial dynamics solved using distrebuted system methods, allowing to investigate several non-pharmaceutical intervention (NPI) policies to control the epidemic.

projects.name: Spatio-Temporal Influence of Non-Pharmaceutical Interventions Policies on Pandemic Dynamics and the Economy: The Case of COVID-19
projects.description: A spatio-temporal mathematical model with economic dynamics. We investigate the influance and find optimal non-pharmaceutical intervention (NPI) policies on the pandemic and the economy.

projects.name: Rivendell v.3 with explicit collaborative learning
projects.description: Improvments to the Rivendell search engine. Including collaborative learning. The development done on C# based dot net core 2

projects.name: Property-Value tagging tool as website
projects.description: Prodcution-ready (C# on dot net core 2) search engine.

projects.name: Rivendell v.2 with online learning search engine
projects.description: Prodcution-ready (C# on dot net core 2 with Angular 8) SaaS providing for taggers an easy to use Property-Value tagging GUI.
